metadata.description: Import of data into Visma L√∏n via decentralized registration, including requirements for file format and fields.

content: Employees may be created and modified by using Decentralized recording.The following fields are key fields:KUNDEFORHOLD (CUSTOMER ID), ARBEJDSGIVER (EMPLOYER), IDENTIFIKATION (IDENTIFICATION), and MEDARBEJDER (EMPLOYEE)You can change the following fields by using Decentralized recording:CPRNR (CIVIL REG. NO.), CVRNR (CVR NUMBER), FORNAVN (FIRST NAME), EFTERNAVN (LAST NAME), ADRESSE1 (ADDRESS1), ADRESSE2 (ADDRESS2), POSTNR (POSTAL CODE), F√òRSTANSAT (FIRST TIME EMPLOYMENT), E-MAIL (E-MAIL), SKATTELANDEKODE (TAX COUNTRY CODE), ANCIENNITET (LENGTH OF EMPLOYEE‚ÄôS EMPLOYMENT), SKATTELANDEKODE (TAX COUNTRY CODE), EBOKS (E-BOX), INITIALER (INITIALS), NEMKONTO, L√òNANCIENNITET and TIN (Tax ID).üë©üè´Case:18;1;MLE-25-MEDA;3;3001609992;;Jensen;Gurli;Skogen 12;;SE-45678;Malm√∏;01082008;[gj@hotmail.dk](mailto:gj@hotmail.dk);SE;000100;H;0108200818;1;MLE-25-MEDA;4;2602639991;;Olsen;Thomas;Sorte v√¶nget 22;;2750;;15082008;;;000015;B;15082008Record format:| Field No. | Excel Column | Name | No. of characters | Type | Value |
